reviews.review_msg: Erickson is a good prof that keeps lectures interesting with humour and other outside influences. The last essay question on his final is alway from left field.  And his late policy is ROCK solid... my computer crashed and I lost my paper hours before it was due... you can still pass the course if this happens just rock the final.
Easy corse, Midterm easy and final preaty easy but you do have to study. He marks the essays easy to! Overall recomended class

Good lecturer. He is able to keep students from falling asleep. 
 If you have questions, he answers them without confusing you. 
 Always wore a suits haha

Why does UBC end up with all our good profs? I was under the impression I was doing quite well in the course. He must not have liked my final paper (ended up with a c+ overall I think). Intelligent and useful person, but his gradeing schiem seemed arbitrary...

Pretty easy course, midterm and final were pretty straight forward and fair.  Interesting lectures that keep you awake.  Nice professor that gives you second chances if you screwed up something by mistake.  Recommended.

I have absolutely no interest in Poli sci...but this prof did his best in making the course interesting! The MT, Final and Paper was very fair. As long as u read the text, u will know what is going on! This is a course that benefits people who watch global news! Cuz u will have a lot to say and bs on in the paper! Also this prof is hawt haha!
His mt is easy. The long questions are a bit harder, but you will be fine as long as you have really read his notes and the textbook.

In my 5+ years of post-secondary education, I have never had a professor as good as Dr. Erickson. His lectures were brilliant and kept me glued to my seat the entire time. His ideas about the logic of the Shield of Achilles is fascinating. If you get a chance, take a class with this prof. You won't regret it!
Super easy class. Tutorials are mandatory not lectures.
